name: places/ChIJRazp_INYwokR3rRYzL56rbw
formattedAddress: 260 W 87th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 260 W 87th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: If I could rate this place a NEGATIVE I would. Please please save yourself the hassle and DO NOT PARK IN THIS GARAGE.  They do not honor their prices. Paid 28 dollars for three hrs through spot hero. Upon arrival I showed the parking attendant the code and he said he would have to charge me another 15 dollars for having a larger car. I agreed. I returned two hrs later( did not even stay three hrs). When I went to go pay the extra 15 dollars the manager who said his name was Alejandro charged me another 55 dollars. When I explained to Alejandro that I already paid through spot hero he was EXTREMELY RUDE and EXTREMELY DISRESPECTFUL . I asked him to refund the extra money and he said no and walked away. The prices here may seem cheap but you will get scammed if you want your car back.

originalText.text: Do not park here. My friend parked here this past weekend, and she was 20 minutes past the time she said she would pick it up and was charged an extra $30 for that. As the attendant pulled the car out, we saw other cars that were parked on the side that were pulled up onto the curb and touching the wall. I'm not sure how you can do that without scratching the car. My friend discovered a scratch on her car but the garage said they can't do anything about that.

originalText.text: I have never ever experienced worse parking service in my life. The staff is completely off line and I even had to call the police to be able to get my car out. Best advice - don’t go there.

text.text: I have never ever experienced worse parking service in my life. The staff is completely off line and I even had to call the police to be able to get my car out. Best advice - don’t go there.

originalText.text: Honest review here. I normally don’t write reviews, but this feels like a must. We're in NYC for the first time from Michigan. $65 parking for 5 hours (he said it was $65 if we stayed till they closed at 10pm but we came back at 7pm and wasn't prorated our money, so we were made to pay the max. Couldn’t even park our own car.We gave the guy our spare key and kept our main key. We got our car back and the spare isn’t in the car anymore, the only reason we’re able to drive is because of our main key. He said the spare key was in the car but we cannot find it and the car would turn on if the key was inside but it won’t. Now we have to go back and try and find our spare key before we leave for home in 2 days. What a hassle.

originalText.text:
We reserved parking here through ParkWhiz, and then saw all the negative reviews and the sub-2.0 rating.  I considered changing garages because of all the negative reviews, but decided to give them a try anyway.

There was only one employee working, so I can see how things could be problematic depending on your timing, but he was very friendly and clear.  We had no issues.  It was fast to drop off our car and also very fast to pick it up.  Nothing bad happened and he didn't try to add any fees or anything.  He was very nice and did a good job.

I would definitely use this garage again.
